text: The Hotel New Hampshire is a 1984 British American Canadian comedy-drama movie directed by Tony Richardson and was based on the 1981 novel of the same name by John Irving. It stars Rob Lowe, Jodie Foster, Beau Bridges, Nastassja Kinski, Amanda Plummer, Matthew Modine, Seth Green, Wallace Shawn and was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 comedy- drama movies Category:1984 LGBT movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Tony Richardson Category:Movies set in Austria Category:Movies set in New Hampshire Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about interracial romance Category:Movies set in hotels
title: The Hotel New Hampshire (movie)
